scripts.all: npm i && npm run start-moc-setup && npm run launch-dapps && npm run check-emission-funds-balance && npm run launch-ceremony-light && npm run set-validators-data-light && npm run add-validator && npm run start-new-validator-node
scripts.start-moc-setup: npm run get-all-submodules && npm run prepare-contracts-repo && npm run prepare-moc-node && npm run start-moc-node && npm run deploy-secondary-contracts && npm run update-spec && npm run start-moc-node && npm run prepare-scripts-moc-repo && npm run test-setup-is-started
scripts.launch-dapps: npm run launch-ceremony-dapp && npm run launch-validators-dapp && npm run launch-governance-dapp
scripts.launch-ceremony: npm run launch-ceremony-1 && npm run launch-ceremony-2 && npm run launch-ceremony-3
scripts.set-validators-data: npm run e2e-validators-test 1 && npm run e2e-validators-test 2 && npm run e2e-validators-test 3
scripts.launch-ceremony-dapp: npm run prepare-ceremony-dapp && npm run prepare-ceremony-dapp-more && npm run start-ceremony
scripts.launch-validators-dapp: npm run prepare-validators-dapp && npm run prepare-validators-dapp-more && npm run start-validators-dapp
scripts.launch-governance-dapp: npm run prepare-governance-dapp && npm run prepare-governance-dapp-more && npm run start-governance-dapp
scripts.launch-ceremony-1: npm run generate-initial-key && npm run get-private-initial-keys && npm run e2e-ceremony-test 1 && npm run prepare-validator-node 1 && npm run start-validator-node 1
scripts.launch-ceremony-2: npm run generate-initial-key && npm run get-private-initial-keys && npm run e2e-ceremony-test 2 && npm run prepare-validator-node 2 && npm run start-validator-node 2
scripts.launch-ceremony-3: npm run generate-initial-key && npm run get-private-initial-keys && npm run e2e-ceremony-test 3 && npm run prepare-validator-node 3 && npm run start-validator-node 3
scripts.start-test-setup: npm run get-all-submodules && npm run prepare-contracts-repo && npm run prepare-moc-node && npm run start-moc-node && npm run deploy-secondary-contracts && npm run update-spec && npm run start-moc-node && npm run prepare-scripts-moc-repo && npm run prepare-ceremony-dapp && npm run prepare-ceremony-dapp-more && npm run generate-initial-keys && npm run get-private-initial-keys && npm run start-ceremony && npm run test-setup-is-started
scripts.start-test-setup-e2e-ceremony-test: npm run start-test-setup && npm run e2e-ceremony-test
scripts.start-moc-validator-setup: npm run start-test-setup-e2e-ceremony-test && npm run prepare-validator-node 1 && npm run start-validator-node 1 > /dev/null 2>&1 & && npm run prepare-validators-dapp && npm run prepare-validators-dapp-more && npm run start-validators-dapp
scripts.test-setup-is-started: echo '### POA test setup is configured ###'
scripts.stop-test-setup: npm run kill-processes && rm -rf ./node_modules/poa-dapps-keys-generation && rm -rf ./node_modules/poa-dapps-validators  && rm -rf ./node_modules/poa-dapps-voting && rm -rf ./submodules/poa-scripts-moc/generateInitialKey/output/* && git submodule update --init --remote && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm i && git clean -f -d && git checkout nodes/reserved_peers
